name: Vanessa Sposi Le Classique
details: 82% Recycled polyamide, 18% Elastane
Cold hand wash separately in mild soap to remove chlorine and salt from garment.
Do not use fabric softeners. Do not wring, soak or bleach.
Do not tumble dry, iron or dry clean. Direct or high heat will damage the integrity of your swimsuit over time.
Dry flat in shade. Do not leave rolled up wet.
Avoid Chlorine, spa baths, tanning products, sunscreen and oils can which cause damage or mark garments or rinse immediately.
In case of stains (pen marks, oil stains, etc.), try to use a chemical-free dishwashing soap.
Slim Fit
Suits small and large busts.
Moderate coverage.
We recommend taking a size smaller than your usual size for a well-curved effect.
Cheeky Fit.
